title: A Simple Life Cycle Model
text:
This note examines the model of Parallel Computing by Rcpp.
For \(t = 1, \dots, T\), households solve
\[
\begin{aligned}
V(t, e, x) =& \max_{c, x'} \frac{c^{1 - \sigma}}{1 - \sigma} + \beta \mathbb{E}V(t + 1, e', x') \\
&\text{s.t. } \\
& c + x' \le (1 + r)x + ew \\
& \text{Pr}(e' | e) = \Gamma(e) \\
& x' \ge 0
\end{aligned}
\]

title: A Simple Life Cycle Model
text:
This note examines the model of Parallel Computing by Rcpp.
For \(t = 1, \dots, T\), households solve
\[
\begin{aligned}
V(t, e, x) =& \max_{c, x'} \frac{c^{1 - \sigma}}{1 - \sigma} + \beta \mathbb{E}V(t + 1, e', x') \\
&\text{s.t. } \\
& c + x' \le (1 + r)x + ew \\
& \text{Pr}(e' | e) = \Gamma(e) \\
& x' \ge 0
\end{aligned}
\]
